description:
$6
Doors open at 7pm

The Tragedy Brothers are not biologically related and their history is not particularly tragic.  ​United by a desire to create and perform their original music, the band draws from the diverse musical experience of its members to create a familiar - yet strikingly original - sound.

Braddock Station Garrison are a Washington DC based band playing melodic rock music featuring Steve Schillinger on vocals and guitar, Tom Soha on lead guitar, Jed Prentice on drums and newest addition Mike Pinkerton on bass. Their music is classic sounding while  remaining modern and engaging
name: Braddock Station Garrison / The Tragedy Brothers - Rochester NY
